config.name: Easier Token of Absolution
config.description: Enable to add an easier Token of Absolution recipe using a Tome of Identify and Tome of Town Portal.

config.name: Easier Runes
config.description: Enable to remove gem requirements from Rune recipes.

config.name: Start With Horadric Cube
config.description: Enable to have Horadric Cube in new character inventories.

config.name: Change Mana Regen
config.description: 120 = Vanilla. Lower numbers give quicker mana regen.
